__e: Captain, there's a small craft closing on the shuttlepod.
Well, to most people he isn't, but, um.... (VEHICLE APPROACHING)
Captain, there's a small craft closing on the shuttlepod.
Well, to most people he isn't, but, um.... (VEHICLE APPROACHING)
There's been an accident. Agent Yauch is dead. What?
I would be pleased ... if you understood our mission in that way.
What about the vehicle this hero was driving?
There's a situation. Wait in the car.
I told you not to let her drive any of the vehicles.
Yeah, well, i'm afraid i'm going to have to ask you to get back In the vehicle for the moment.
They said there's a vehicle right up here. You got an I.D.?
No vital signs? None whatsoever. As a matter of fact, there's no one in that vehicle.
- I don't know where the vehicle is! I'm in the trunk.
The vehicle in the garage exhibits heat stress.
I hope you're not planning on driving that.
Okay, I've basically got no control of a 15-ton vehicle.
- Be nice if you had something with doors.
Plus I understand you have to be standing next to the vehicle with your card when they arrive.
